title: Who Else is Like Me? Surgery Survival Prediction
description: This is an interactive website that takes in information about a surgery and uses a KNN model to predict the survival rate of the surgery. It also includes an interactive piechart that allows the user to discover similar cases in the database.

title: Bikewatch: Boston & Cambridge
description: This is a dynamic visualization project that tracks and analyzes bike traffic patterns in Boston and Cambridge. By leveraging Mapbox, D3.js, and public bike-share data, this project provides real-time insights into bike departures, arrivals, and total traffic at various stations.

title: LOL Pro Play Analysis: Action-Packed Games & Player Position Prediction
description: Conducted an in-depth analysis of professional League of Legends match data from the 2022 season to identify performance differences across leagues and player positions.

title: Taylor Swift Search Engine
description: This is a search engine for Taylor Swift music using python and baby panda.

title: Metorite Impact Analysis with NASA Dataset
description: Analyzed a comprehensive NASA dataset of recorded meteorite landings. Explored correlations between meteorite size, geographic location, and population density at the sites of impact and likelihood of discovery.
